name: European Association of Qualified Entities
goal: Namens verschillende, door EASA (European Aviation Safety Agency) en door CAA gecertificeerde Qualified Entities op te treden als overleg partner van de Europese Unie, waaronder Commissies  en EASA.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Environment, International co-operation and development, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Europees Certificeringswerk zoals omschreven in de EU/EASA verordening 218/1139 (EASA basis regelgeving) en de nieuwe EASA Basic regulation
